scripts.install: (cd coup-client && pnpm i) & (cd server && pnpm i) & wait
scripts.dev: cd coup-client && pnpm start & cd ../server; pnpm start
scripts.prod: serve coup-client/build & (cd server && node index.js) & wait
scripts.reset: rm -rf node_modules & rm -rf **/node_modules & pnpm clean & wait
